about_the_game:
Welcome to the game "Candy land"!

A game for puzzle lovers and for real sweet tooths ! After all, it is filled with a lot of goodies-ice cream, cake, cakes , marshmallows and many more sweets !

In addition , the game "Candy land" will help to develop memory, attentiveness and ingenuity.

In front of you are cards with different "delicious" images. The images are hidden from you. You need to find all pairs of identical images. You can open two cards at the same time. Remember the pictures, look for their pairs, and try to use as few attempts as possible , because in this game you can set your own records, which makes it possible to play together with your friends!

The game has 20 levels. After each completed level, you will open a new level, with a new difficulty.

Well, rather turn on the game and join us ! Have a nice game !

name: Candy land

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel(R) Celeron(R) CPU G530 @2.40 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9600 GSO 512
  • Storage: 120 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Celeron(R) CPU G530 @2.40 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9600 GSO 1024
  • Storage: 120 MB available space
